FuncDef:
The isis prefix-attributes node-disable command sets the N flag in the extended prefix attribute of a loopback interface in an IS-IS process to 0.
The undo isis prefix-attributes node-disable command restores the N flag of the extended prefix attribute of a loopback interface in an IS-IS process to 1. The isis prefix-attributes node-disable command sets the N flag in the extended prefix attribute of a loopback interface in an IS-IS process to 0. The undo isis prefix-attributes node-disable command restores the N flag of the extended prefix attribute of a loopback interface in an IS-IS process to 1. By default, the N flag in the extended prefix attribute of a loopback interface in an IS-IS process is 1.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of an IS-IS multi-instance process.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.
